title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message:
When I connect the battery, the laptop restarts.
When I connect the wireless cable, the computer does not respond.

computer itself is fine, but when i plug, don't work

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message:
Are the battery and wifi cable/airport card tested? Very likely liquid damage to airport card or the cable. 
Does the battery indicator light up if you press the button without the battery installed?

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message:
The battery Indicator light works.
I will test the airport card.

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: Is it charging the battery at all? Or is the machine not working at all when the battery is connected?

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: the machine dont working at all when the battery is connected

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: I would try a known good battery first then.

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: I try before and don't work.

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: What is your PPBUS_G3H voltage with only AC. Then check it with machine off and only battery connected. Measure at F7040

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: PPBUS_G3H in F7040 is 12.57V

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: And how much with a battery plugged in? There could be a short on PPVBAT_G3H_CONN

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: PPBUS_G3H in F7040 just battery: 11.47v

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: PPVBAT_G3H_CONN (just battery): 11.04v

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: Any Advice, Louis?

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message:
Where was the original damage? Drop, liquid somewhere(where if liquid)? This is too weird a problem to just happen out of the blue. We need hints!

The last time I had a machine that would reboot when charger or battery was plugged in it was an SMC issue, but that was almost three years ago... and once, ever.

When you plug in a known good battery with a full charge, do you get all the green LEDs to light up on the battery indicator?

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message:
Battery issue Fixed!

I'm working right now on the AIRPORT/BLUETOOTH. When i plug in the board, the computer wont turn on, or will turn on and shutdown.

Any advice guys?

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: Louis or Duck, any advice?

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: Did you replace the airport and cable? What was the battery issue?

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: Yes, i replaced the airport. Keeping rebooting...

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: You replaced the airport, did you replace the cable? Are you connecting this with the machine on?? I hope not!

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: No Title

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: I just replace the Q7085 and everything works fine.

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: no i didn't.

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message:
I see a picture but you still did not say if the cable was replaced.
I also see some crap around Q7812, what is going on there?

title: 820-3115 - B - Battery + Wireles (Weird)
message: The Q7812 is fine also i replaced the cable.
